roles.headline: Senior Software Engineer
description: Introduced Docker and Spring to the development team to successfully deploy a REST service used to query an Accumulo database
Developed and integrated a reusable automation testing framework with Python & NiFi used to replace manual tests and ensure quality across a number of projects
Improved code quality and consistency within the department by integrating tools such as SonarQube and EditorConfig into the development process
Key Skills: Python, Docker, Spring, Cucumber, Gherkin, Behave, NiFi, Agile, Spark, Hadoop, Zookeeper, Kafka

roles.headline: Scrum Master
description: Organise and facilitate all scrum events (Sprint Planning, Daily Scrum, Sprint Review and Sprint Retrospectives) in a department new to Agile
Perform daily refactoring on user stories and tickets to ensure developers are not blocked and that acceptance criteria meet client needs
Report on project progress, team velocity and sprint/release progress to the client and management on a weekly basis
Defined team way of working and definition of done to ensure a consistent workflow and quality standard for all work delivered
Obtained Scrum Master certification in July 2018
Key Tools: Agile, JIRA, Confluence

roles.headline: Lead UX Designer & UI Developer
description: Forest Thematic Exploitation Platform - Developed a service that offers access to pre-processed satellite/ancillary data and provides an environment and tools for processing forestry data. This is now a widely used service accessed globally within the earth observation community

Smart Passport Application Forms - Produced a new set of electronic passport application forms for Gibraltar, Guernsey, Jersey & Isle of Man. These utilised the PDF417 standard allowing printed form data to be scanned in, saving time and eliminating mistakes made from previous manual data entry
Designed and developed prototype interfaces for a number of proposals, leading to winning work for a number of projects
Uplifted a number of internal projects to bring the quality and branding inline with more modern interfaces
Ran a number of phone and face to face interviewers for front-end developers across multiple departments, leading to successful hires

Key Skills: Angular 2-7, AngularJS, JavaScript (ES6), Node.js, JQuery, HTML 5, Sass, Less, CSS3, Bootstrap, Foundation, Material, Selenium, Cypress, Protractor, REST, Karma, Jasmine, Mocha, Chai, Webpack, Gulp, Grunt

name: University of the West of England

roles.headline: Peer Assisted Learning Leader
description: Worked with tutors, employers and careers staff to improve existing student career support
Gave a number of presentations to help second year students with placement preparation and applications
Ran one-on-one workshops to advise students with their career goals, CVs, covering letters and placement applications

roles.headline: Software Engineer
description: Developed a number of the most highly requested features by users, lead usability sessions throughout to ensure user needs were met before release
Worked in Quality Assurance fixing all high priority defects and fixed all product accessibility defects, ensuring full system compliance
Developed a Support Assistance tool automating data collection for 2nd line support. This saved a significant amount of time for the team on a daily basis
Ranked 71st of 15000+ in the IBM Cybersecurity War Games, then lead web-application security events at IBM, UCL & Cambridge University
Taught programming lessons at Ashburnham Community School and Longfield Primary School, then lead two months of lessons at Macaulay CE School for IBM's Lego Robo Challenge 2014.
Core Skills: Java, Javascript, Dojo, ANT, Linux
